subject: Error in loading dll
msgSnippet: I have a test that creates an object. This object tries to load a dll. Outside the JUnit, everything goes fine. But inside JUnit, my object is unable to load
messageBody:
I have a test that creates an object. This object tries to load a dll.
Outside the JUnit, everything goes fine. But inside JUnit, my object
is unable to load the dll, even though it's in the path.

Can anyone help with this, telling me how to fix this issue ?

Thanks in advance.
Jefferson
